mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO production
PRODUCTION, CHANGED, YIELD, PRODSTOP, POWER, RATE, VARIETY, RHYTHM, PLANCOMP, EQUIPSTOP, STARTTIME, ACTUALCOMP, TOOLSTOP, OVERTIME, PRODSTATE, CREATER, ADDDATE, FLAG,
#{production}, #{changed}, #{yield}, #{prodstop}, #{power}, #{rate}, #{variety}, #{rhythm}, #{plancomp}, #{equipstop}, #{starttime}, #{actualcomp}, #{toolstop}, #{overtime}, #{prodstate}, #{creater}, #{adddate}, #{flag},

insert.foreach:
INSERT INTO production
ID, PRODUCTION, CHANGED, YIELD, PRODSTOP, POWER, RATE, VARIETY, RHYTHM, PLANCOMP, EQUIPSTOP, STARTTIME, ACTUALCOMP, TOOLSTOP, OVERTIME, PRODSTATE, CREATER, ADDDATE, FLAG,
#{item.id}, #{item.production}, #{item.changed}, #{item.yield}, #{item.prodstop}, #{item.power}, #{item.rate}, #{item.variety}, #{item.rhythm}, #{item.plancomp}, #{item.equipstop}, #{item.starttime}, #{item.actualcomp}, #{item.toolstop}, #{item.overtime}, #{item.prodstate}, #{item.creater}, #{item.adddate}, #{item.flag},
